EmailTemplate.name: The Business Data Lake – an evolution in Data Infrastructure.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for The Business Data Lake – an Evolution in Data Infrastructure Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: The Business Data Lake – an Evolution in Data Infrastructure We're glad you can join us. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are looking forward to you joining us for our next installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series.
Event Details:
Date: Thursday, January 23, 2014
Time: 9AM PST (San Francisco) / 5PM GMT (London)
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=663114322>
Event Number: 663 114 322
Teleconferencing Information:
This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 663 114 322
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
